{"id":1100599638,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 6 days","timestamp":1700202408,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"549 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1100599638/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Triangular Sum of an Array","memory":"381.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    // Looking at the contraints, it is clear that we can apply Brute Force (Recursion)\n    int triangularSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n=nums.size();\n        if(n==1) return nums[0];\n        vector<int> newNums;\n        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++) newNums.emplace_back((nums[i]+nums[i+1])%10);\n        nums=newNums;\n        return triangularSum(nums);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-triangular-sum-of-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
